org.nlpcraft.model

Interface NCModelProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NCModelProviderAdapter

    public interface NCModelProvider
extends Serializable
    Model provider. Model provider is a deployment unit and acts as a factory for models. Note that single provider can support one or more different models, and multiple providers can be deployed into the probe.

    In most cases users should use NCModelProviderAdapter for convenience.

    See Also:
    NCModelProviderAdapter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<NCModelDescriptor> getDescriptors()
      Gets the list, possibly empty but never null, of model descriptors supported by this provider.
      NCModel makeModel(String id)
      Gets fully initialized model instance for given model ID.

    • Method Detail

      • makeModel

        NCModel makeModel(String id)
        Gets fully initialized model instance for given model ID. Note that this method can either create new model on demand or reuse the existing (cached) one if it is safe to do so.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique, immutable ID of the model to make.
        Returns:
        Fully initialized model instance or null if provider does not support model with given ID.
        See Also:
        NCModelDescriptor.getId()

      • getDescriptors

        List<NCModelDescriptor> getDescriptors()
        Gets the list, possibly empty but never null, of model descriptors supported by this provider. Note that getting list of descriptors separately from the models themselves allows to query the provider without actually creating any models which can be an expensive process with side effects.
        Returns:
        List of model descriptors supported by this provider (possibly empty but never null).
